column5: This kid caught this beauty pike right by where we were fishing. I caught it on film and promised I would put it on You tube. <object width="320" height="265"><param name="movie" value="
Great vid and good on you for posting it for him!!!  It's really nice that he put it back down the hole too!!!
thats a pretty nice pike! The chorus to the song makes the video so ironic.
Come on now, we all know that fish was caught in Europe, and shows up every couple of months.... Oh?!  Sorry wrong post.   Nice Fish.
Great video.  Good job grabbing it too!!  Is that water on top of the ice behind them?  Joey
WHAT!!!   No vid of my 3" pickeral????  That sure made Patrick's day!  Can't wait to get up there again.
great video!!! awesome to let that thing go back down the hole!!!  cheers!
Nice job on the video and chorus iceguy.That makes a lasting memory! Kerry
That video shows the skills of fighting and landing a decent pike through the ice. Well done on the camera angles etc...   Thanks for sharing.
Great job on the video iceguy Loved the background music also!!  Congratulations to the kid for catching and releasing this beautiful gator  Thanks for sharing Leechman
